entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI: __arglist is not preserved as a parameter #31196
  • Static web asset paths are absolute in a .NET 7 MVC project #31194

Closed

  • [GenAPI] missing `new` keyword on return types #30082
  • dotnet SDK 6.0.405 and 406 still requires dependencies after installing SDK+runtime in CBL-Mariner #30694
    Discussion
  • It was not possible to find any installed .NET Core SDKs #28539
    Discussion
  • `dotnet publish --os Linux` in .NET 7 references .NET 6 #28350
    Discussion
  • I have c# please send me solution #30445
    Discussion
  • Missing PackageDefinitions metadata after 7.0.200 update #30809
    Discussion
  • GenAPI outputs reference to internal type in assembly-level attribute #31098

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #31202
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't add AOT package in restore for < net7 #31201
    Area-NativeAOT
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31197
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #31192
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #31191
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #31189
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [draft] moving dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31181
  • Blazor configuration for StartupMemoryCache and Jiterpreter #31174
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [GenAPI] add new keyword to member signature when base member is hidden #30932
    Area-GenAPI
  • Refactor command line options parsing, add/improve imp of --launch-profile and --no-launch-profile options. #31054
    Area-Watch
  • Fix race condition in BrowserRefreshServer #31105
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #31188
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Split static web assets SDK from the Razor SDK #31079
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.2xx #31190
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #31187
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #31186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31135
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tests for the operation(install/uninstall/update package) when global settings file is corrupted #30970
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30972
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30973
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanup and gen api should not reference internal type attribute argument #31158
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31172
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.10.0 to 19.11.1 in /eng/dependabot #31151
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Updated

  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
  • WebAssembly SDK #31154
    Area-Infrastructure
